'''The Starlit Past''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[The Shimmering Voyage]]''. It used to play in [[Mondstadt City]] at nighttime, but has been removed from the pool of possible soundtracks during [[Version 1.1]]{{Verify}}.
